paper.title: Design of Class Hierarchies: An Introduction to OO Program Design
paper.authors: Viera K. Proulx and Kathryn E. Gray
paper.comment: Conference version of the ECOOP 2005 paper.

paper.title: Java IO and Testing Made Simple
paper.authors: Viera K. Proulx and Richard Rasala
paper.comment: Presents the use of JPF for IO, testing and exploration of Java code.

paper.title: Simple Problem Solving in Java: A Problem Set Framework
paper.authors: Viera K. Proulx, Richard Rasala, and Jason Jay Rodrigues
paper.comment: Presents the Problem Set Framework for testing of Java code.

paper.title: Objects From the Beginning - With GUIs
paper.authors: Viera K. Proulx, Jeff Raab, and Richard Rasala
paper.comment: Interactive GUI-based labs for introducing objects first.

paper.title: The SIGCSE 2001 Maze Demonstration Program
paper.authors: Richard Rasala, Jeff Raab, and Viera K. Proulx
paper.comment: Illustrates the use of Java Power Tools for rapid GUI building.

paper.title: Java Power Tools: A Foundation for Interactive HCI Exploration
paper.authors: Viera K. Proulx, Richard Rasala, and Jeff Raab
paper.comment: Java Power Tools for GUI building and exploration.

paper.title: Java Power Tools:Model Software for Teaching Object-Oriented Design
paper.authors: Richard Rasala, Jeff Raab, Viera K. Proulx
paper.comment: The first overview of the Java Power Tools toolkit.

paper.title: Traffic Light: A Pedagogical Exploration Through a Design Space
paper.authors: Viera K. Proulx, Jeff Raab, and Richard Rasala
paper.comment: Illustrates the use of graphics and GUIs to represent classes and objects.

paper.title: Programming Patterns and Design Patterns in the Introductory Computer Science Course
paper.comment: Presents the pedagogy of elementary program patterns for novice programmers.

paper.title: Hospital Emergency Room Simulation: Object Oriented Design Issues for CS2
paper.comment: A programming project to explore a variety of interacting classes and objects.

paper.title: Traffic Simulation: A Case Study for Teaching Object-Oriented Design
paper.comment: A programming project with a nubmer of interacting classes and objects.

paper.title: Scaling: A Design Pattern in Introductory Computer Science Courses
paper.authors: Harriet J. Fell, Viera K. Proulx, and Richard Rasala
paper.comment: A study of scaling as a fundamental design concept.

paper.title: Usage Simulation for Evaluating Educational Materials
paper.authors: Viera K. Proulx, and Joseph W. Proulx
paper.comment: Evaluation of Lab Materials by a Targeted User.

paper.title: Recursion and Grammars for CS2
paper.comment: A programming project using L-systems grammars to generate fractal drawings.

paper.title: Exploring Martian Planetary Images C++ Exercises for CS1
paper.authors: Harriet Fell and Viera K. Proulx
paper.comment: A programming project to explore image processing in the context of Mars images.

paper.title: Writing Across Computer Science Curriculum
paper.authors: Harriet J. Fell, Viera K. Proulx, and John Casey
paper.comment: Examples of opportunities to develop writing skills.

paper.title: Foundations of Computer Science: What Are They and How Do We Teach Them
paper.authors: Harriet J. Fell, Viera K. Proulx, and Richard Rasala
paper.comment: Design, apprentice learning, software support, visualization.

paper.title: From Animation to Analysis in Introductory Computer Science
paper.authors: Richard Rasala Viera K. Proulx, and Harriet J. Fell
paper.comment: Complexity of algorithms through animation and measurements.

paper.title: Instructional Frameworks: Toolkits and Abstractions in Introductory Computer Science
paper.authors: Cynthia Brown, Harriet Fell, Viera Proulx, and Richard Rasala
paper.comment: Toolkits and graphics in support of apprentice style of learning.
